claim: Reds is an American epic drama film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Reds is a 1981 American epic drama film co-written , produced and directed by Warren Beatty .

claim: Reds is an American epic drama film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: McGourty 's films have been selected for a number of prestigious film festivals : the BFI London Film Festival , The American Epic Sessions IDFA , American Epic : The Big Bang IDFA , American Epic : Out Of The Many The One '' at the Hawaiian International Film Festival where it was nominated for the Halekulani Golden Orchid Award , '' The American Epic Sessions '' -RSB- North American premiere at the SXSW Film Festival 2016 -RSB- , the Gothenburg Film Festival in Sweden , and the Sundance Film Festival on 28th Jan 2016 where Robert Redford presented the USA premiere of American Epic at The Eccles .
